title: Looking for players to player normals
body: I changed my name from Becca is hot. I'm not running away from haters from the previous post. Add me to chill and play normal. Add me to stand up against being bullied for no reason :)

replies.body: bullied for no reason??? you abused the whole team cause you couldnt take one joke i have screen shots dont try lie, do not play with this person.. if you need the pics add me ill imgur them to you x
IGN: okh8rs is my new IGN :)
